translation.en: What went we out into this wilderness to find?
translation.ko: 우리가 이런 야만적인 곳에 뭘 찾으러 왔겠어요?
우린 나라와 동족과 주님의 집까지 버리고

translation.en: -For what? -We must ask thee to be silent.
Was it not for the pure
and faithful dispensation of the Gospels
translation.ko: 진실한 복음과 주님의 나라를 전파하러 온 게 아니면

translation.en: We are your judges, and not you ours.
translation.ko: 우리가 당신을 판단하지 당신이 판단하는 게 아니오

translation.en: I cannot be judged by false Christians,
translation.ko: 난 부정한 기독교인들에게 재판을 받을 수 없어요

translation.en: for I have done nothing save preach Christ's true Gospel.
translation.ko: 난 그리스도의 참된 복음을 전파했을 뿐이죠

translation.en: Must you continue to dishonor the laws of the Commonwealth
translation.ko: 당신의 그 자만심으로 계속해서 영국 연방법을 어기고

translation.en: and the Church with your prideful conceit?
If my conscience sees it fit.
translation.ko: 내 양심이 시키는 대로 할 겁니다

translation.en: Then shall you be banished from this plantation's liberties.
translation.ko: 그렇다면 이 농장에서 당신은 추방될 것이오

translation.en: I would be glad on it.
Then take your leave, and trouble us no further.
translation.ko: 이곳을 떠나서 더는 우리에게 문제를 일으키지 마시오

translation.en: How sadly hath the Lord testified against you.
translation.ko: 슬프게도 주님은 당신에게 불리한 증언을 하셨군요

translation.en: I will confess Jehovah with all heart
In secret and assembly of the just
Great are the works of our Lord Jehovah
Sought out of all that In them do delight...
I here confess I have lived in sin.
I have been idle of my work,
I have, in secret, played upon thy Sabbath
translation.ko: 저는 주님의 안식일에 몰래 놀러 갔으며

translation.en: and broken every one of thy commandments in thought,
followed the desires of mine own will and not the Holy Spirit.
translation.ko: 성령이 아닌 저 자신의 욕망을 따라 움직였습니다

translation.en: I know I deserve all shame and misery in this life,
translation.ko: 이런 삶에 대해 수치심과 고통을 느끼는 게 당연한 걸 압니다

translation.en: for the sake of thy Son, forgive me.
There you are. There you are.
There you are. There you are.
...and send thy Holy Spirit into me,
which may show me that thou art my father
translation.ko: 하느님 아버지의 모습을 볼 수 있게 하시고

translation.en: 'Tis no ease to rise on a gray day.
translation.ko: 흐린 날에는 잠에서 깨기가 쉽지 않지

translation.en: The Devil holds fast your eyelids.
Thy mother's not slept a night since.
translation.ko: 간밤에 엄마는 제대로 못 잤을 거야

translation.en: We can search no more, Caleb.
If not a wolf, then hunger'd have taken him yet.
translation.ko: 늑대 짓이 아니라면 굶주린 자들이 이미 먹었을 거야

translation.en: I've been a-laying traps for some while now, even before this new misery.
translation.ko: 또 불행을 겪기 전에 덫을 설치하는 중이었어

translation.en: Will thou not help thy father?
You and Mother have always forbad us to set foot there.
translation.ko: 엄마랑 아빠는 항상 우리에게 숲에 가지 말라고 하셨잖아요

translation.en: Caleb, our harvest cannot last the winter.
translation.ko: 케일럽, 우리 농작물로는 겨울까지 버티지 못할 거야

translation.en: We must catch our food if we cannot grow it.
translation.ko: 재배할 수 없다면 사냥하러 가야 해

translation.en: We will conquer this wilderness. It will not consume us.
translation.ko: 우리가 여기서 살아남으려면 이 황무지를 정복해야 해

translation.en: ...and send thy Holy Spirit into me,
which may show me that thou art my father and I am thy child...
translation.ko: 주님의 모습을 보여주소서 저는 주님의 자식이오니...

translation.en: Art thou then born a sinner?
Aye. I was conceived in sin, and born in iniquity.
translation.ko: 네, 전 원죄 속에서 잉태되었고 죄악에서 태어났어요

translation.en: And what is thy birth sin?
Adam's sin imputed to me, and a corrupt nature dwelling within me.
translation.ko: 아담의 죄가 제게 전가되어 타락한 본성을 가지게 된 거예요
잘 기억하고 있구나, 케일럽 아주 잘했어

translation.en: And canst thou tell me what thy corrupt nature is?
translation.ko: 타락한 본성이 뭔지 말해줄 수 있니?

translation.en: My corrupt nature is empty of grace,
bent unto sin, only unto sin, and that continually.
translation.ko: 죄를 짓고 싶어 하고 계속 죄를 짓는 거죠

translation.en: We pray he hath entered God's Kingdom.
-What wickedness hath he done? -Place faith in God, Caleb.
translation.ko: - 무슨 죄를 지었죠? - 주님을 믿거라, 케일럽

translation.en: -We'll speak no more on thy brother. -Why?
He hath disappeared not one week past, yet you and Mother utter not his name.
translation.ko: 사라진 지 일주일도 안 됐는데 이름조차 말하지 않으시잖아요

translation.en: Mother will not stop her prayer...
And if I died? If I died this day?
-What is this? -I hold evil in me heart.
translation.ko: - 그게 무슨 말이야? - 제 속엔 악이 있어요

translation.en: -And if God will not hear my prayers? -Caleb!
but 'tis God alone, not man, what knows who is a son of Abraham and who is not.
translation.ko: 누가 진실한 기독교인인지 주님은 다 알고 계신단다

translation.en: Who is good and who is evil.
Fain would I tell thee Sam sleeps in Jesus,
translation.ko: 새뮤얼이 예수님 품에서 잠들었다고 말해주고 싶구나

translation.en: that thou wilt, that I will,
translation.ko: 너도 그럴 거고 나도 그럴 거야

translation.en: but I cannot tell thee that.
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 그걸 확신할 순 없어

translation.en: From Indian Thom and Old Slater, when last they passed through.
translation.ko: 저번에 톰 씨와 슬레이터 씨가 지나갈 때 교환한 거야

translation.en: Speak none of this to Mother. None.
I'll tell her of the cup when her grief has passed.
translation.ko: 슬픔이 좀 가시고 나면 내가 은잔 얘길 할 거야

translation.en: Let's not speak on this again.
Praise be to God. Make haste, Caleb.
Black Phillip, Black Phillip A crown grows out his head
Black Phillip, Black Phillip To nanny queen is wed
Black Phillip, Black Phillip King of sky and land
Black Phillip, Black Phillip King of sea and sand
We are ye servants We are ye men
Black Phillip eats the lions From the lions' den
translation.ko: 사자 굴에서 나온 사자를 블랙 필립이 먹었네

translation.en: Black Phillip, Black Phillip A crown grows out his head
Black Phillip, Black Phillip A crown grows out his head
Black Phillip, Black Phillip To nanny queen is wed
Get back! You two, stop that!
Whither were you and Caleb this morn?
I told thee to keep watch of Jonas and Mercy.
I was, and I bade them help me, and they paid me no mind.
translation.ko: 애들한테 좀 도와달라고 했는데 신경도 안 썼다고요

translation.en: -I was a-getting-- -What's the matter with thee, Thomasin?
translation.ko: - 저는... - 넌 대체 왜 그래, 토마신?

translation.en: Take thy father's rags to the brook and wash 'em.
translation.ko: 개울에 가서 아빠 옷을 빨아 와

translation.en: -They would pay me no mind-- -And brush out his woolens.
It gave me such a fright to find thee gone.
translation.ko: 네가 사라진 줄 알고 얼마나 놀랐는지 아니?

translation.en: I'll not be left here alone.
translation.ko: 난 여기 혼자 있지 않을 거예요

translation.en: The morning's work is well behindhand.
-Jonas! Leave thy sister be! -She likes it.
translation.ko: - 조너스, 머시 좀 그냥 둬! - 머시가 좋아해요

translation.en: What, cannot a father spend Godly time with his son?
translation.ko: 아버지가 아들이랑 경건한 시간 좀 보내면 안 돼?

translation.en: Stop it, each of you! Stop it.
Get inside. Get inside. Get inside.
I had thought I seen an apple tree in the valley.
-for if we glanced that wolf-- -Why did you not tell me?
translation.ko: - 혹시 늑대가 있을까 봐... - 왜 말하지 않았니?

translation.en: Father wanted it a surprise to cheer you, and...
I thought I had seen them.
I like you not outside the farm. Even to the valley.
translation.ko: 경작지 밖으로 나가지 않았으면 해 계곡도 마찬가지야

translation.en: Be a good lad and get some water for Mother.
translation.ko: 착한 아들답게 엄마한테 물 좀 갖다 드려

translation.en: -Stop it. -I meant no harm in it.
I have seen no apple since we went from England.
translation.ko: 잉글랜드를 떠난 후로 사과를 본 적이 없어

translation.en: I be the Witch of the Wood.
I be not Mercy, I be the Witch of the Wood.
And I have come to steal ye!
Hear me stick a-flying through the trees...
translation.ko: 하늘을 나는 빗자루를 타고 나무를 지나서...

translation.en: Why is't when thou dost a wrong,
I be a-washing Father's clothes like a slave, and thou art playing idle?
translation.ko: 난 노예처럼 옷을 빨고 있는데 넌 빈둥거리기나 할 거야?

translation.en: I'll tell Mother you have left the farm alone.
translation.ko: 너만 경작지에 두라고 엄마한테 말할 거야

translation.en: Black Phillip saith I can do what I like.
translation.ko: 블랙 필립이 마음대로 해도 된다고 했어
악마가 네 블랙 필립을 데려갈 거야

translation.en: It's your fault I can't leave the yard.
translation.ko: 내가 멀리 못 나가는 건 언니 때문이야

translation.en: I could go to the brook before you let the Witch take Sam.
translation.ko: 마녀가 새뮤얼을 데려가기 전엔 계곡까지 갈 수 있었어

translation.en: -Quiet thee. -It were a wolf stole Sam.
A witch. I've seen her in her riding cloak about the wood.
translation.ko: 마녀야, 내가 숲에서 망토를 두른 여자를 봤어

translation.en: -Father showed me the tracks. -It was a witch!
translation.ko: - 난 늑대 발자국을 봤어 - 마녀 발자국이야!

translation.en: I be the Witch of the Wood.
my spirit slips away from me body and dances naked with the Devil.
translation.ko: 내 영혼이 몸에서 빠져나가 악마와 춤을 추지

translation.en: He bade me bring him an un-baptized babe,
so I stole Sam, and I gave him to me master.
translation.ko: 그래서 새뮤얼을 납치해서 그에게 갖다 줬어

translation.en: And I'll make any man or thing else vanish I like.
translation.ko: 내가 원하면 어떤 사람이든 무엇이든 사라지게 할 거야

translation.en: And I'll vanish thee, too, if thou displeaseth me.
translation.ko: 날 화나게 하면 너도 사라지게 할 거야

translation.en: Or perchance I'll boil and bake thee,
translation.ko: 어쩌면 널 물에 끓이고 구울지도 몰라

translation.en: How I crave to sink my teeth into thy pink flesh.
If ever thou tellst thy mother of this, I'll witch thee and thy mother!
translation.ko: 엄마한테 말했다간 엄마와 널 마녀에게 데려갈 거야

translation.en: -Stop thy tears and swear thy silence. -I swear it.
translation.ko: - 울지 말고 말 안 한다고 맹세해 - 맹세해

translation.en: You will not tell Mother nor Father.
Get away from her, Caleb, or she'll witch thee!
translation.ko: 언니한테서 달아나, 오빠 아니면 마녀에게 데려갈 거야

translation.en: Why tell Mercy those horrible fancies?
translation.ko: 머시에게 왜 그렇게 무서운 얘길 해?

translation.en: Dost thou hate me now, too?
It was a wolf stole Sam.
Go tell Mother and Father of my wickedness.
translation.ko: 내 악령에 대해 부모님께 가서 말해

translation.en: ...and forgive us the sins we have this day committed against thee.
Free us from the shame and torment which are due unto us for them.
translation.ko: 우리가 잘못한 일에 대한 수치심과 고통을 걷어가 주소서

translation.en: We beseech thee, increase our faith in the promise of the Gospel,
translation.ko: 간청하오니 복음의 약속에 대한 우리의 믿음이 커지게 해주소서

translation.en: and the hatred of all our sins,
that we may be assured that the Holy Spirit dwells in us,
translation.ko: 우리 안에 성령이 함께하심을 믿게 하시고

translation.en: that we might be thy children in thy love and mercy.
translation.ko: 당신의 사랑과 자비 속에 주님의 자녀가 되게 하소서

translation.en: For as we hunger for this food of our bodies,
so our souls hunger for the food of eternal life.
translation.ko: 우리 영혼이 영원한 생명의 음식을 갈구하오니

translation.en: Finish soon our days of sin,
and bring us to eternal peace
through the purifying blood of thy son,
our Lord and only Savior Jesus Christ.
translation.ko: 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 이름으로 기도드립니다

translation.en: Thomasin, what hast thou done with the silver cup?
It has been disappeared for some while.
I have caught thee trifling with it before.
translation.ko: 저번에 네가 가지고 노는 걸 봤어

translation.en: She sayth she haven't touched it, Katherine.
How thou could lose me father's silver wine cup in this hovel, I cannot know.
translation.ko: 집에 있던 주님의 은잔을 어떻게 잃어버릴 수가 있죠?

translation.en: Did a wolf vanish that, too?
What is amiss on this farm?
will thou read out the chapter of the Word tonight?
We must find some light in our darkness.
Tomorrow we will have a fast day but for our sins.
translation.ko: 내일은 금식할 거다 우리 죄 때문이지

translation.en: Thomasin, didst not bed them down before supper?
translation.ko: 토마신, 저녁 식사 전에 가축들을 재우지 않았니?

translation.en: Thou dost remember I love thee?
I fear thou dost look too much upon this affliction.
translation.ko: 당신이 너무 고통스러워하며 사는 게 두려워

translation.en: We must turn our thoughts towards God, not ourselves.
translation.ko: 우리 자신이 아닌 주님 생각에 집중해야 해

translation.en: He hath never taken a child from us.

translation.ko: 누가 그런 축복을 받을 수 있겠어?

translation.en: We have been ungrateful of God's love.
He hath taken us into a very low condition to humble us
translation.ko: 우리를 겸손하게 만드시려고 어려움을 겪게 하시는 거야

translation.en: and to show us more of his grace.
Was not Christ led into the wilderness to be ill met by the Devil?
translation.ko: 악마를 만나게 하려고 이 황무지로 보내신 건가요?

translation.en: -We should ne'er have left the plantation. -Kate...
-There is naught hither. -What need we? Silver chalices?
translation.ko: - 여긴 아무것도 없잖아요 - 우리에게 그깟 은잔이 필요해?

translation.en: How dare you chide me on a cup.
translation.ko: 어떻게 은잔에 대해 날 책망할 수 있죠?

translation.en: 'Tis not for vanity that I am grieved of it.
translation.ko: 내가 슬픈 이유는 욕심 때문이 아니에요

translation.en: -Katherine, I must tell thee-- -We might have sold it.
translation.ko: - 캐서린, 당신에게 말할 게... - 그걸 팔 수도 있었잖아요

translation.en: What fool will trade for our corn?
Our daughter hath begat the sign of her womanhood.
translation.ko: 우리 딸은 이제 성인이 될 징조를 보여요

translation.en: She must leave to serve another family.
-Kate, I must tell thee-- -Aye, it was thine
translation.ko: - 내가 말할 게... - 네, 당신 잘못이었죠

translation.en: Our children are being fostered up like savages.
How oft I begged and begged thee to take Samuel for baptism.
translation.ko: 새뮤얼에게 세례를 받게 하자고 내가 얼마나 간청했나요?

translation.en: They'd not baptize outside the congregation.
translation.ko: 자신들의 신도가 아니면 세례를 해주지 않아
- 우리 아들은 지옥에 있어요 - 그렇지 않아

translation.en: God save us, Caleb is well.
We must keep him still. And Thomasin.
translation.ko: 케일럽은 그대로 둬야 해 토마신도 그렇고

translation.en: -We cannot back to that church! -We will starve!
translation.ko: - 교회로 돌아갈 순 없어 - 우린 굶어 죽을 거예요!

translation.en: I'll to the village with the horse and Thomasin tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 말을 타고 토마신과 마을로 갈 거야

translation.en: The Tildens or the Whytings, they can make use of her.
translation.ko: 틸든이나 와이팅 가족이 토마신을 받아줄 수 있을 거야

translation.en: We will find food. I know it.
If thou wilt back to sleep, and keep silent of this,
translation.ko: 누나가 다시 자러 가고 이걸 비밀로 한다면

translation.en: you'll need not leave to serve the Tildens, nor any family else.
translation.ko: 누나는 다른 집으로 일하러 가지 않아도 될 거야

translation.en: If you don't let me along with you, I'll wake Mother and Father this instant.
translation.ko: 나랑 같이 가지 않는다면 부모님을 당장 깨울 거야

translation.en: We had glass windows in England.
We haven't been hither so long you can forget that.
Dost not remember Fowler laying on the floor i'the sun?
translation.ko: 파울러가 햇빛이 드는 바닥에 누워있었던 거 기억나?

translation.en: And where the sun would shine would he warm himself.
translation.ko: 햇빛이 비치는 곳에서 몸을 데우곤 했잖니

translation.en: Remember once he lay upon the table,
and Father saw him and he saith, "We will have him for meat!
translation.ko: 아빠가 그걸 보고 말했잖아 '오늘 고기로 먹어야겠다!'

translation.en: "Kate, Kate! We will roast this beast."
I remember that day, but no glass.
translation.ko: 그날은 기억나지만 유리창은 기억 안 나

translation.en: O God my Lord, I now begin, O help me, and I'll leave my sin.
translation.ko: 주님, 저를 도와주시어 죄악에서 벗어나게 해주소서

translation.en: For I repentant now shall be. From evil, I will turn to thee.
translation.ko: 악에서 주님에게로 돌아가 회개할 수 있게 해주소서

translation.en: None ever shall destroy my faith, nor do I mind what Satan saith.
translation.ko: 사탄의 말이나 어떠한 것도 저의 신앙을 깨뜨릴 수 없습니다

translation.en: O God my Lord, I now begin, O help me, and I'll leave my sin.
translation.ko: 주님, 저를 도와주시어 죄악에서 벗어나게 해주소서

translation.en: For I repentant now shall be. From evil, I will turn to thee.
translation.ko: 악에서 주님에게로 돌아가 회개할 수 있게 해주소서

translation.en: None ever shall destroy my faith, nor do I mind what Satan saith.
translation.ko: 사탄의 말이나 어떠한 것도 저의 신앙을 깨뜨릴 수 없습니다

translation.en: O God my Lord, I now begin, O help me, and I'll leave my--
translation.ko: 주님, 저를 도와주시어 죄악에서 벗어나게 해주소서

translation.en: What's the matter with thee, Thomasin?
I'll set off at first light. I'll not return till I've found him.
translation.ko: 동틀 무렵 출발해서 케일럽을 꼭 찾아서 돌아올게

translation.en: 'Twould be better to go to the village to raise up help.
translation.ko: 마을로 가서 도움을 청하는 게 나아요

translation.en: and I have no horse. There is no time to be lost.
translation.ko: 지금은 말도 없고 낭비할 시간도 없어

translation.en: Likely you should have left this morn then.
You have no gun, William, nay, not even a dog.
-Be not a fool! -I am a fool to go.
translation.ko: - 바보짓 하지 마요! - 마을로 가는 게 바보지

translation.en: There is none will help this family.
translation.ko: 거긴 우리 가족에게 도움 될 게 없어

translation.en: The moon is bright. The rain bothers me not.
translation.ko: 달도 밝고 비는 문제 될 거 없어

translation.en: I'll be back in a two-day, if any a man will return with me.
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있어도 이틀 후에 돌아올 거야

translation.en: Tell us why you went to the wood.
Let me find favor in your eyes.
Child, tell me, and thou wilt.
I, yestermorn, took Caleb to the wood.
translation.ko: 어제 내가 케일럽을 데리고 숲으로 갔어

translation.en: 'Twas for food, and the pelts for money. Good money.
translation.ko: 음식을 구하려고 그랬어 날가죽은 값이 나가니까

translation.en: -I knew it! -I meant it as a surprise,
'twas why I kept secret. I will trap that wolf, Kate.
translation.ko: 그래서 비밀로 한 거야 덫으로 늑대를 잡을 거야

translation.en: You stood by whilst our son lied to me!
'Twas for thy sake. I love thee, Kate.
-You took him to the woods! -I will find him.
translation.ko: - 애를 숲에 데려갔잖아요! - 내가 찾을 거야

translation.en: You have broken God's covenant. You are a liar.
-And you have lost another child. -I will go now.
-You cannot escape the wood! -I will find him!
translation.ko: - 숲에 들어가면 못 나와요 - 반드시 찾을 거야!

translation.en: Will Jonas be the man of the house?
Will you damn all your family to death?
have the goats been bedded down yet?
Let it wait till the morrow.
They dare not 'scape with this rain.
O merciful Father, the Lord and giver of life,
and your son Jesus Christ, we beseech thee,
look down from heaven upon him
with those eyes of grace and compassion.

translation.ko: 오빠가 왜 아픈 거야 블랙 필립?

translation.en: What ails him? Did Thomasin make 'im sick in the wood?
translation.ko: 언니가 숲에서 오빠를 아프게 한 거야?

translation.en: Black Phillip saith you are wicked.
He saith you put the Devil in Caleb, that's why he's sick.
translation.ko: 언니가 오빠에게 악령을 넣어서 오빠가 아픈 거래

translation.en: I'd never hurt Caleb, nor Sam, nor thee.
translation.ko: 난 케일럽을 아프게 한 적 없어 새뮤얼도, 너도 마찬가지야

translation.en: That first winter, he was tormented of Indian magic.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 겨울에 인디언의 마법에 홀렸잖아요

translation.en: Does this not look like witchcraft?
Thy thoughts are as a child.
We'll back to the plantation in the morn.
Find a good family for Thomasin, take Caleb to the doctor's.
translation.ko: 토마신이 일할 집을 찾고 케일럽은 의사에게 데려가야지

translation.en: He will tell if this be some natural ill or no.
Yet we cannot return as beggars.
There must be some fruit yet untouched by this rot.
translation.ko: 아직 상하지 않은 과일이 있을 거야

translation.en: I beseech thee, Katherine, what canst thou do for him presently?
translation.ko: 당신이 지금 케일럽을 위해 할 수 있는 게 없잖아

translation.en: How might we all bear it to the village with no horse?
translation.ko: 말도 없이 마을까지 어떻게 간다는 거죠?

translation.en: Well, the little corn and the goats should fetch a fair price. We'll...
translation.ko: 남은 옥수수와 염소를 적당한 가격에 팔아야지

translation.en: We'll back with Caleb and sell them,
translation.ko: 우린 케일럽과 마을로 가서 그걸 팔고

translation.en: return with a horse for the twins and Thomasin.
translation.ko: 말을 사서 쌍둥이와 토마신을 데리러 오면 돼

translation.en: -You cannot leave them here! -Or Thomasin and thee...
translation.ko: - 애들만 두고 갈 순 없어요! - 토마신과 당신이...

translation.en: Tell me and I will give it thee.
Thou shall be home by candle-time tomorrow.
I also have a confession to make.
I never meant to be a shrew to thee.
translation.ko: 잔소리나 하는 여자가 될 생각은 없었어요

translation.en: I have become as Job's wife, I know it,
translation.ko: 힘든 일을 많이 겪다 보니 이렇게 됐죠

translation.en: My heart has turned to stone.
I had dreamed once, 'twas when I was of Thomasin's years,
translation.ko: 한때는 꿈이 있었죠 내가 토마신 또래였을 때요

translation.en: that I was with Christ upon Earth.
I was so very near him,
and in many tears for the assurance of the pardon of me sins,
translation.ko: 나의 원죄를 사면받았음을 확신하고 눈물도 많이 흘렸죠

translation.en: and I was so ravished with his love towards me,
I thought it far exceeding the affection of the kindest husband.
translation.ko: 친절한 남편의 애정보다 훨씬 대단한 사랑이었어요

translation.en: I have such a sad weakness of faith. I cannot shake it.
translation.ko: 신앙도 약해졌고 슬픔을 떨칠 수가 없어요

translation.en: I cannot see Christ's help as near.
I pray and I pray, but I cannot...
I fear I cannot ever feel that same measure of love again.
translation.ko: 다시는 그런 큰 사랑을 느낄 수 없는 게 두려워요

translation.en: Thou shalt have of it in heaven.
If you can spare a while, do.
Black Phillip is a merry, merry king He rules the land with mirth...
translation.ko: 블랙 필립은 행복한 왕이네 그는 웃음으로 나라를 다스렸다네

translation.en: Black Phillip has a mighty, mighty sting He'll knock thee to the earth
translation.ko: 블랙 필립은 강한 뿔이 있어 너를 쓰러뜨릴 거야

translation.en: Sing baa baa King Phillip the Black sings baa, baa...
Sing baa baa, King Phillip the Black He'll knock thee on thy back!
Get the broad ax and cut off her head.
translation.ko: 넓은 도끼를 가져와 그녀의 머리를 잘라

translation.en: Get the narrow ax and cut off her head.
translation.ko: 좁은 도끼를 가져와 그녀의 머리를 잘라

translation.en: Get the broad ax and cut off her head.
translation.ko: 넓은 도끼를 가져와 그녀의 머리를 잘라

translation.en: Get the narrow ax and cut off her head.
translation.ko: 좁은 도끼를 가져와 그녀의 머리를 잘라

translation.en: Who does this to thee? Who does this?
-What horrible fancy's this? -She told me she stole Sam!
translation.ko: - 이런 끔찍한 일이... - 언니가 새뮤얼을 납치했어요

translation.en: -She gave him to the Devil in the wood. -They lie!
She turned Flora's milk to blood!
She had bade us keep secret from you!
It was but a jest to quiet her. I...
-She made bargain with Satan! -She signed his book!
Don't let her near me. She'll place a curse on me!
translation.ko: 근처에 못 오게 해주세요 날 저주할 거예요

translation.en: -They conspire against me. -Thomasin is a witch!
I'll have proof, or heaven help thee.
translation.ko: 내가 증명하마 아니면 하늘이 증명할 거야

translation.en: Look me in the eye, daughter.
-Dost thou love the word of God? -Yes.
Love you the Bible? Love you prayer?
We are children of sin all,
translation.ko: 우린 모두 원죄를 가진 신의 자녀들이다

translation.en: yet I tell thee, I have raised up no witch in this house!
translation.ko: 난 이 집에서 마녀를 키운 적이 없다

translation.en: We shall never lie open to the wicked one.
translation.ko: 우린 결코 사탄에게 상처받지 않을 것이야

translation.en: Our Father, which art in heaven,
hallowed be thy name, thy kingdom come...
I... I cannot remember my prayer.
Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be thy name...
translation.ko: 하늘에 계신 우리 아버지 아버지의 이름이 거룩히...

translation.en: -Sends 'em upon me! -She desires of my blood.
translation.ko: - 그들을 나에게 보냈어요! - 그 여자가 내 피를 원해

translation.en: -They feed upon her teats... -She desires of my blood.
translation.ko: - 그들은 그녀의 가슴과... - 그 여자가 내 피를 원해

translation.en: My Lord, my Jesus, save me!
translation.ko: 나의 주님, 나의 예수님 날 구해주세요!

translation.en: I am thine enemy, wallowing in the blood and filth of my sins!
translation.ko: 난 주님의 적이 아니에요 원죄의 오물 속에 뒹굴고 있어요

translation.en: -The Lord is my shepherd... -I am thine enemy!
-...I shall not want. -He maketh me lie down
-in green pasture... -And leadeth me by the still waters.
translation.ko: - 눕게 해 주시고... - 잔잔한 물로 이끌어 주셨도다

translation.en: He restoreth my soul and leadeth me in the paths of righteousness
translation.ko: 내 영혼을 회복시키고 자기 이름을 위하여 옳은 길로

translation.en: -for his name's sake. -I am thine enemy!
Yea, though I should walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
Cast the light of countenance upon me.
translation.ko: 제 얼굴에 축복의 빛을 비추어 주시고

translation.en: Spread over me the lap of thy love.
Wash me in the ever-flowing fountains of thy blood.
translation.ko: 끊임없이 흐르는 당신의 피로 내 죄를 씻어주시어

translation.en: Wholly thine I am, my sweet Lord Jesus.
translation.ko: 나를 완전하게 해주소서 사랑하는 나의 주님

translation.en: My Lord, my love, kiss me with the kisses of thy mouth.
translation.ko: 나의 사랑, 나의 주님 당신의 입을 내 입에 맞춰 주소서

translation.en: Get away from him! Get thee gone!
This tree will be lovely come spring.
Do you remember when we came hither?
Next year I'd have sown us a wheat field.
Started at this tree and ended thither.
We'd have been a proper farm then.
translation.ko: 그때는 제대로 된 경작지가 될 거야

translation.en: Bought us a big fat milk cow,
translation.ko: 질 좋은 우유를 만드는 소도 데려오고

translation.en: Tomorrow, I cannot keep secret of this.
A council will be called, and thy life is...
translation.ko: 의회로 소환될 거야 그러면 네 삶은...
- 네 삶은... - 제 말을 못 믿으세요?

translation.en: I saw the serpent in my son. You stopped their prayers.
translation.ko: 난 케일럽에게서 악마를 봤고 넌 쌍둥이의 기도를 멈췄잖니

translation.en: -I love Caleb. -And who then found him,
translation.ko: - 난 케일럽을 사랑해요 - 그리고 네가 찾았잖아

translation.en: pale as death, naked as sin and witched?
translation.ko: 사체처럼 창백했고 벌거벗고 홀린 채로 말이야

translation.en: Thomasin, listen to me, the bargain thou hast made is of no effect.
translation.ko: 토마신, 잘 들어라 악마와의 거래는 효과가 없어

translation.en: -I made no bargain. -Thy soul belongeth to Christ.
translation.ko: - 거래한 적 없어요 - 네 영혼은 주님 것이야

translation.en: -I made no bargain. -The Devil hath no interest in thee.
translation.ko: - 거래한 적 없다고요 - 악마는 네게 관심 없어

translation.en: -I am no witch, Father. -What did I but see in my house?
translation.ko: 난 마녀가 아니에요 그럼 내가 집에서 봤던 건 뭐니?

translation.en: -Will you not hear me? -I prithee, confess.
Why have you turned against me?
Christ can unwitch us if you will but speak truth to me.
translation.ko: 네가 사실대로 말한다면 주님이 네 마법을 풀어주실 거다

translation.en: As I love thee, speak truth.
You ask me to speak truth?
You and Mother are planned to rid the farm of me.
translation.ko: 아빠와 엄마는 나를 멀리 보내려고 하셨잖아요

translation.en: I heard you speak of it.
You took of Mother's cup and let her rail at me.
translation.ko: 아빠가 은잔을 가져갔으면서 엄마가 날 탓하게 그냥 두셨죠

translation.en: You confessed not till it was too late.
You took Caleb to the wood, and let me take the blame of that, too.
translation.ko: 케일럽을 숲에 데려간 건 아빠면서 날 탓했고요

translation.en: You let Mother be as thy master.
You cannot bring the crops to yield! You cannot hunt!
translation.ko: 아빠는 농작물도 못 키우고 사냥도 못 하잖아요

translation.en: Thou canst do nothing save cut wood!
translation.ko: 나무를 베는 것 말고는 아무것도 못 하시죠!

translation.en: And you will not hear me!
Must I hear the Devil wag his tongue in thy mouth?
translation.ko: 악마의 입에서 나오는 말을 들을 필요가 있겠니?

translation.en: They spend all day long babbling to that horned beast.
translation.ko: 온종일 그 검은 염소랑 수다만 떨면서 보내니까

translation.en: The Adversary oft comes in the shape of a he-goat.
-The twins know it. -Slander thy brethren no more.
'Twas they and that goat what bewitched this whole farm.
translation.ko: 쌍둥이와 그 염소가 경작지에 마법을 건 거예요

translation.en: Mercy told me herself by the stream, "I be the Witch of the Wood."
translation.ko: 머시가 개울 옆에서 말했어요 '난 숲속의 마녀다'

translation.en: Get her from me sight. I'll not have her in this house.
translation.ko: 내 눈앞에 안 보이게 해요 집에 들이지 않겠어요

translation.en: What is the cause, daughter? Tell thy mother.
Thou toldst me well thou knew!
they made covenant with the Devil in the shape of Black Phillip.
translation.ko: 블랙 필립의 모습으로 나타난 악마와 거래를 했어요

translation.en: Did ye make some unholy bond with that goat?
translation.ko: 너희가 그 염소와 불경한 거래를 했다고?

translation.en: I will not play a fool to children's games.
translation.ko: 난 애들 장난에 놀아나지 않을 거야

translation.en: Yet these lies from our babes' mouths are but trifles to them.
translation.ko: 애들 입에서 나온 거짓말은 별로 중요하지 않아

translation.en: -Thou know it not! -The Devil will speak the Scripture, too.
translation.ko: - 아닌 거 알잖아 - 악마도 성경을 말해요

translation.en: Thou know it not! 'Tis not true!
and I will smite Jonas as Abraham would have done his seed.
-No. Stop it! Stop it! -Fetch the billhook,
translation.ko: - 안 돼, 그러지 마! - 낫을 가져와

translation.en: and I will dash his skull!
No, it is not safe. Not with them!
translation.ko: 이건 위험해요 얘들과 함께 있을 수 없어요

translation.en: If that old billy be the Devil, I would have danced with him myself.
translation.ko: 숫염소가 악마라면 내가 염소와 춤을 추겠어

translation.en: I'll break thee out upon the dawn, and we'll set back to the plantation.
translation.ko: 새벽에 널 꺼내주마 그리고 우린 농장으로 갈 거야

translation.en: Doth he really speak to thee?
I am infected with the filth of pride.
Dispose of me how thou wilt,
They cannot tame their natural evils.
I lie before thee a coward
translation.ko: 당신 앞에 엎드려 빕니다 저는 겁쟁이고...

translation.en: and I'll lick the dust of thine earth.
I have not damned my family!
Mother, we have longed to see you so.
We would see you oft, Mother.
I have brought a book for you, Mother.
-Will you look at it with me? -Aye.
-I know not what I saw... -Where are they?
I did nothing. She came from the sky, she...
translation.ko: 난 아무것도 안 했어요 여자가 갑자기 나타났어요

translation.en: You have their blood upon thy hands!
The Devil is in thee and hath had thee.
translation.ko: 네 안에 있는 악마가 널 조종했어

translation.en: You are smeared of his sin.
-You have made a covenant with death! -Mother!
You bewitched thy brother, proud slut!
translation.ko: 네가 동생을 홀리게 했어 난잡한 년!

translation.en: Did you not think I saw thy sluttish looks to him,
translation.ko: 네가 동생을 유혹하고 매춘부처럼 현혹한 걸

translation.en: bewitching his eye as any whore?
-What say you to me? -And thy father next!
You killed thy father! You witch!
I love you! I love you!
I conjure thee to speak to me.
Speak as thou dost speak to Jonas and Mercy.
Dost thou understand my English tongue?
Wouldst thou like the taste of butter?
Wouldst thou like to live deliciously?
Wouldst thou like to see the world?
Dost thou see a book before thee?

translation.ko: 내가 손을 잡아서 쓰게 해 줄게
